posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post $ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server _[HTML]: Hyper Text Markup Language $ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files $ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites $ hexo deploy More info: Deployment graph TD; A-->B; A-->C; B-->D; C-->D; Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque hendrerit lacus ut purus iaculis feugiat. Sed nec tempor elit, quis aliquam neque. Curabitur sed diam eget dolor fermentum semper at eu lorem. Do not just seek happiness for yourself. Seek happiness for all. Through kindness. Through mercy. David LevithanWide Awake
